# ui-rendering

## Purpose
Implement UI rendering capabilities, component structure, and user-facing flows.

## Inputs / Outputs
- Inputs: UI requirements, mockups, components, design tokens
- Outputs: UI components, views, layout logic, styling

## Tools / Constraints
- Prefer existing UI patterns in the repo
- Keep changes minimal and scoped
- Avoid introducing new frameworks without approval

## Success Criteria
- UI matches requirements
- No regressions in existing views
- Accessible and responsive where applicable

## Non-goals
- Backend schema changes
- Infrastructure changes
